alert.note: Alert for Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:44PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Washington County through 530 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout tornado 8 miles south of Platner, or 12 miles southeast of Akron, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible, winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Landspout tornadoes can damage mobile homes, roofs, vehicles, and trees. Outdoor objects may be tossed about. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Otis and Elba. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
